#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int i,j,n,a,dig,ans;
    char c[15];
    int ab[20];
    j=3;
    for(i=0;i<15;i++)
    ab[i]=0;
    for(i=0;i<4;i++)
    {
    scanf("%s",c);
    if(strcmp(c,"white")==0)
    n=9;
    else if(strcmp(c,"grey")==0)
    n=8;
    else if(strcmp(c,"violet")==0)
    n=7;
    else if(strcmp(c,"blue")==0)
    n=6;
    else if(strcmp(c,"green")==0)
    n=5;
    else if(strcmp(c,"yellow")==0)
    n=4;
    else if(strcmp(c,"orange")==0)
    n=3;
    else if(strcmp(c,"red")==0)
    n=2;
    else if(strcmp(c,"brown")==0)
    n=1;
    else if(strcmp(c,"black")==0)
    n=0;
    a=n;
    while(a!=0)
    {
    ab[j--]=a%2;
    a=a/2;
    }
    j=4*(i+2)-1;
   // printf("%d\n",j);
    }
  //  for(i=0;i<=15;i++)
  //  printf("%d",ab[i]);
  //  printf("\n");
  ans=0;
    for(i=0;i<=15;i++)
    {
        ans=ans+ab[i]*((int)pow(2,15-i));
    }
    printf("%d",ans);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    printf("0");
    printf(" Guntur\n");
   // printf("\n");
    return 0;
}
